name: alch_spawn_04
text: You can call me Al! He's the brains of the operation.
text_simple: you can call me al hes the brains of the operation

name: alch_spawn_05
text: I'm the brains! And I'm the brawn!
text_simple: im the brains and im the brawn

name: alch_firstblood_01
text: First Blood! We're off to an explosive start!
text_simple: first blood were off to an explosive start

name: alch_move_20
text: Easy now, this stuff is explosive!
text_simple: easy now this stuff is explosive

name: alch_move_24
text: Tiptoe now, you're shaking my brew!
text_simple: tiptoe now youre shaking my brew

name: alch_attack_15
text: I always do your dirty work.
text_simple: i always do your dirty work

name: alch_cast_01
text: My little friend wants a word with you.
text_simple: my little friend wants a word with you
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Ordered to cast an ability

name: alch_cast_02
text: We got something special for you.
text_simple: we got something special for you

name: alch_cast_03
text: Got a fresh batch on the way.
text_simple: got a fresh batch on the way

name: alch_ability_acid_09
text: I don't wanna walk in that.
text_simple: i dont wanna walk in that

name: alch_ability_concoc_03
text: Gotta get rid of this stuff!
text_simple: gotta get rid of this stuff

name: alch_ability_concoc_06
text: Little bit of this, little bit of that.
text_simple: little bit of this little bit of that

name: alch_ability_concoc_09
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Unstable Concoction (50% chance)

name: alch_ability_concoc_15
text: Mixed that up special for you!
text_simple: mixed that up special for you
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Unstable Concoction (50% chance)

name: alch_ability_concoc_25
text: Didn't you hear me telling you to throw it?
text_simple: didnt you hear me telling you to throw it

name: alch_ability_concoc_26
text: Maybe you want to trade places?
text_simple: maybe you want to trade places

name: alch_ability_concoc_27
text: Next time maybe I can try throwing?
text_simple: next time maybe i can try throwing

name: alch_ability_goblin_04
text: I'm gonna need a bin for it all.
text_simple: im gonna need a bin for it all

name: alch_ability_rage_14
text: I can't believe I'm seeing this with my own eyes!
text_simple: i cant believe im seeing this with my own eyes
pretty_criteria: A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_ability_rage_25
pretty_criteria: Casting Chemical Rage|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_ability_failure_02
pretty_criteria: A platinum hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_ability_failure_04
text: What were you thinking? Shut up!
text_simple: what were you thinking shut up

name: alch_ability_failure_05
text: Not your best work, boss. You're telling me?
text_simple: not your best work boss youre telling me

name: alch_ability_failure_06
text: That didn't go so well. Thanks for pointing out the obvious.
text_simple: that didnt go so well thanks for pointing out the obvious

name: alch_ability_failure_07
text: I have to say--If I want your opinion, I'll ask for it!
text_simple: i have to sayif i want your opinion ill ask for it

name: alch_kill_02
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_kill_03
text: It's all part of the formula.
text_simple: its all part of the formula

name: alch_kill_04
text: You've been mixing with the wrong crowd.
text_simple: youve been mixing with the wrong crowd

name: alch_kill_06
text: That's you distilled to your essence.
text_simple: thats you distilled to your essence

name: alch_kill_08
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_kill_09
text: You're melting, you're melting, ha ha!
text_simple: youre melting youre melting ha ha

name: alch_kill_15
text: The boss said you had to go.
text_simple: the boss said you had to go

name: alch_kill_16
text: You want I should keep punching him, boss?
text_simple: you want i should keep punching him boss

name: alch_kill_17
text: Aw, I was just getting started.
text_simple: aw i was just getting started

name: alch_rival_01
text: Damn, was gonna ask Batrider if he wanted to trade mounts. Hey!
text_simple: damn was gonna ask batrider if he wanted to trade mounts hey

name: alch_rival_02
text: You don't think Pudge will mind if we salvage him for fluids, do ya?
text_simple: you dont think pudge will mind if we salvage him for fluids do ya

name: alch_rival_03
text: Pudge, were you tapping methane? Yikes!
text_simple: pudge were you tapping methane yikes

name: alch_rival_04
text: I always wondered what you'd get if you melted Apparition down.
text_simple: i always wondered what youd get if you melted apparition down

name: alch_rival_05
text: All right! Fairy dragon blood is hard to come by.
text_simple: all right fairy dragon blood is hard to come by

name: alch_rival_06
text: Hey, you think Kunkka knew I stole his rum?
text_simple: hey you think kunkka knew i stole his rum

name: alch_rival_07
text: Morphling, if I could have shoved you in a beaker...
text_simple: morphling if i could have shoved you in a beaker

name: alch_rival_10
text: Clinkz, your bones were brittle. Shoulda eaten more spinach.
text_simple: clinkz your bones were brittle shoulda eaten more spinach

name: alch_rival_11
text: Pugna's full of phosphorus? That makes sense.
text_simple: pugnas full of phosphorus that makes sense

name: alch_rival_13
text: A little mercury goes a long way, eh, Slardar?
text_simple: a little mercury goes a long way eh slardar

name: alch_rival_14
text: Thanks to Slardar I can rig up an excellent mercury switch.
text_simple: thanks to slardar i can rig up an excellent mercury switch

name: alch_rival_15
text: Get out the siphon. Clockwerk's full of gasoline!
text_simple: get out the siphon clockwerks full of gasoline

name: alch_rival_16
text: Sniper, if you're done with all that gunpowder, I can use it.
text_simple: sniper if youre done with all that gunpowder i can use it

name: alch_rival_17
text: I didn't need a tree trunk to knock you out, Earthshaker.
text_simple: i didnt need a tree trunk to knock you out earthshaker

name: alch_rival_18
text: My fists beat your axe, Axe.
text_simple: my fists beat your axe axe

name: alch_rival_19
text: You made my knuckles bleed, Spirit Breaker.
text_simple: you made my knuckles bleed spirit breaker

name: alch_lasthit_02
text: Now that's how you make gold.
text_simple: now thats how you make gold

name: alch_death_04
text: How'd I get mixed up in this!
text_simple: howd i get mixed up in this

name: alch_death_09
text: Sorry, friend, I let you down.
text_simple: sorry friend i let you down

name: alch_death_18
text: Don't put me out of my misery yet.
text_simple: dont put me out of my misery yet

name: alch_respawn_03
text: Let's see if I can improve on that formula.
text_simple: lets see if i can improve on that formula

name: alch_respawn_04
text: I've got some new recipes to try out.
text_simple: ive got some new recipes to try out

name: alch_respawn_06
text: Failure is just another kind of success. The wrong kind.
text_simple: failure is just another kind of success the wrong kind
pretty_criteria: Respawning|A master hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_respawn_07
text: Well, that was a waste of ingredients.
text_simple: well that was a waste of ingredients

name: alch_respawn_08
text: That's one way to work out the impurities.
text_simple: thats one way to work out the impurities

name: alch_respawn_09
text: Maybe I should find some more stable formulas.
text_simple: maybe i should find some more stable formulas

name: alch_respawn_10
text: I hope I didn't leave anything on the burner.
text_simple: i hope i didnt leave anything on the burner

name: alch_rare_02
text: You're all right, you know that?
text_simple: youre all right you know that

name: alch_rare_03
pretty_criteria: Rare|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_rare_04
text: Say hello to the nice people. Eh, he's shy.
text_simple: say hello to the nice people eh hes shy

name: alch_purch_01
text: Oh, this is gonna be good! Is it new shoes?
text_simple: oh this is gonna be good is it new shoes

name: alch_purch_02
text: We pooled our money for this!
text_simple: we pooled our money for this

name: alch_purch_03
text: I love buying new equipment! Is it a back brace?
text_simple: i love buying new equipment is it a back brace

name: alch_blink_01
text: Blink dagger! Less walking is good!
text_simple: blink dagger less walking is good

name: alch_blink_02
text: We're gonna have some fun with this!
text_simple: were gonna have some fun with this

name: alch_item_05
text: Assault Cuirass! Boss, that's not gonna fit on you.
text_simple: assault cuirass boss thats not gonna fit on you

name: alch_bottle_01
text: Everything good comes from a bottle.
text_simple: everything good comes from a bottle

name: alch_deny_07
text: Trust me, you didn't want it anyway.
text_simple: trust me you didnt want it anyway

name: alch_lose_03
text: The whole world went to lead!
text_simple: the whole world went to lead

name: alch_win_03
pretty_criteria: Winning a game|A bronze hero chat wheel was used

name: alch_doubdam_02
text: No more splitting the damage between us.
text_simple: no more splitting the damage between us

name: alch_happy_04
pretty_criteria: Activating an arcane rune|Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: alch_invis_02
text: Been trying to figure out this formula for ages.
text_simple: been trying to figure out this formula for ages

name: alch_illus_03
text: I don't think I have enough bottles for all of us!
text_simple: i dont think i have enough bottles for all of us

text: Hey little buddy, it's in the bag!
text_simple: hey little buddy its in the bag
